What is the outlook for Gerstmann's Syndrome ?,"In adults, many of the symptoms diminish over time. Although it has been suggested that in children symptoms may diminish over time, it appears likely that most children probably do not overcome their deficits, but learn to adjust to them.",NINDS,Gerstmann's Syndrome
